mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO file_dfs_info(file_info_id, file_group, file_path, file_size, file_order, remark, isvalid, ctime, creater, mtime, updater) VALUES
( #{item.fileInfoId}, #{item.fileGroup}, #{item.filePath}, #{item.fileSize}, #{item.fileOrder}, #{item.remark}, 1, now(), #{item.creater}, now(), #{item.updater} )
